verses.verse: If there arise <S%H6965><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you a prophet, <S%H5030><s%> or a dreamer <S%H2492><s%> of dreams, <S%H2472><s%> and he give <S%H5414><s%> you a sign <S%H226><s%> or a wonder, <S%H4159><s%>

and the sign <S%H226><s%> or the wonder <S%H4159><s%> come to pass, <S%H935><s%> of which he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Let us go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>" (which you have not known <S%H3045><s%>) "and let us serve them; <S%H5647><s%>"

you shall not listen <S%H8085><s%> to the words <S%H1697><s%> of that prophet, <S%H5030><s%> or to that dreamer <S%H2492><s%> of dreams: <S%H2472><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> proves you, <S%H3426><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> whether you <S%H3426><s%> love <S%H157><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul. <S%H5315><s%>

You shall walk <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and fear <S%H3372><s%> him, <S%H8104><s%> and keep his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him, <S%H1692><s%> and cling to him.

That prophet, <S%H5030><s%> or that dreamer <S%H2492><s%> of dreams, <S%H2472><s%> shall be put to death, <S%H4191><s%> because he has spoken <S%H1696><s%> rebellion <S%H5627><s%> against Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and redeemed <S%H6299><s%> you out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage, <S%H5650><s%> to draw <S%H5080><s%> you aside out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to walk in. <S%H3212><s%> So you shall put <S%H1197><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> from the midst of you. <S%H7130><s%>

If your brother, <S%H251><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of your mother, <S%H517><s%> or your son, <S%H1121><s%> or your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or the wife <S%H802><s%> of your bosom, <S%H2436><s%> or your friend, <S%H7453><s%> who is as your own soul, <S%H5315><s%> entice <S%H5496><s%> you secretly, <S%H5643><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Let us go <S%H3212><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%>" which you have not known, <S%H3045><s%> you, <S%H1><s%> nor your fathers;

of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who are around <S%H5439><s%> you, <S%H7138><s%> near to you, <S%H7350><s%> or far off from you, <S%H7097><s%> from the one end of the earth <S%H776><s%> even to the other end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%>

you shall not consent <S%H14><s%> to him, <S%H8085><s%> nor listen to him; <S%H5869><s%> neither shall your eye pity <S%H2347><s%> him, <S%H2550><s%> neither shall you spare, neither shall you conceal him: <S%H3680><s%>

but you shall surely <S%H2026><s%> kill <S%H2026><s%> him; <S%H3027><s%> your hand shall be first <S%H7223><s%> on him to put him to death, <S%H4191><s%> and afterwards <S%H314><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of all the people. <S%H5971><s%>

You shall stone <S%H5619><s%> him to death with stones, <S%H5619><s%> because he has sought <S%H1245><s%> to draw you away <S%H5080><s%> from Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage. <S%H5650><s%>

All Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall hear, <S%H8085><s%> and fear, <S%H3372><s%> and shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H1697><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> such wickedness <S%H7451><s%> as this is in the midst of you. <S%H7130><s%>

If you shall hear <S%H8085><s%> tell concerning one <S%H259><s%> of your cities, <S%H5892><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to dwell <S%H3427><s%> there, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Certain <S%H1121><s%> base <S%H1100><s%> fellows <S%H582><s%> are gone out <S%H3318><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you, <S%H5080><s%> and have drawn away the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of their city, <S%H5892><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Let us go <S%H3212><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%>" which you have not known; <S%H3045><s%>

then you shall inquire, <S%H1875><s%> and make search, <S%H2713><s%> and ask <S%H7592><s%> diligently; <S%H3190><s%> and, <S%H571><s%> behold, if it be truth, and the thing <S%H1697><s%> certain, <S%H3559><s%> that such <S%H2063><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> is done <S%H6213><s%> in the midst of you, <S%H7130><s%>

you shall surely <S%H5221><s%> strike <S%H5221><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> destroying it utterly, <S%H2763><s%> and all that is therein and its livestock, <S%H929><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

You shall gather <S%H6908><s%> all its spoil <S%H7998><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of its street, <S%H7339><s%> and shall burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and all its spoil <S%H7998><s%> every whit, <S%H3632><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> and it shall be a heap <S%H8510><s%> forever; <S%H5769><s%> it shall not be built again. <S%H1129><s%>

Nothing <S%H3972><s%> of the devoted thing <S%H2764><s%> shall cling <S%H1692><s%> to your hand; <S%H3027><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> may turn <S%H7725><s%> from the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of his anger, <S%H639><s%> and show <S%H5414><s%> you mercy, <S%H7356><s%> and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> on you, <S%H7235><s%> and multiply you, <S%H7650><s%> as he has sworn to your fathers; <S%H1><s%>

when you shall listen <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> all his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
